Text: Hey Shallow02, dont you think the comments/thanks have become rather rare lately ?
Yeah, now that you mention it, they have. Recently I have noticed several shoots where neither the WMV OR the MP4's got any thanks/comments.

Yes, noticed that too, HA, FM and TS on Wednsday, WA, US and IR on Friday/Saturday. 

You know we find something else to do with our evenings if ppl dont appreciate the work we do..

I could always find one or 2 other ways to spend my evenings from 21.00 CET and out..

 AFTER downloading the shoots for myself ofcourse ;)
Ofcourse, hehe :)

I guess its in their hands now.. personally I would like to see 2-3 thanks on each upload, but thats just me. 

Enough people are downloading them according to my stats.

But there are some who are good at saying thanks, lets not forget that.

But there are som regulars who are good at showing appreciation, this is not meant for you.

You know who you are, and we are very grateful  :)
I really love uploading this stuff, hope they want us to continue..
Me too...

wait? what?


we do! we do!!!

Merzedes and Shallow2 I can't Thank Both of You Enough, Without your contributions I don't know how any of us would get this KINK content. I do Appreciate both your efforts and hope that anyone who's ever downloaded from you drops a note thanking you!
Thanks guys! =)
Ofc we enjoy and appreciate your work ! But personally I watch mostly perfect slave and electro sluts :) Keep up the good work, will remember to give you thanks each time I download something :)
Your work is very much appreciated! Thank you!

I'll comment even though I am not going to download this particular set -- I do love and enjoy all the two of you do, and while I probably only get one or two a month (I'm pretty particular) it doesn't escape me that *because* the volume of stuff you do is so impressive I can afford to be choosy about what I do and don't get.

In particular I am thankful for the example images and text that describes the stuff so I can know if I want to get it or not.

So mucho gracious, and mea culpa if I don't always leave a thank you.

Dude you really are the best for this. Thank you, Thank you, Thank you!

I don't actually DL porn from Piratebay that often but whenever I do I'll always remember to comment with a "Thanks". Seriously I won't forget this.
WE LOVE YOU GUYS!
i like your content Merzedes and Shallow! and i try to leave comment to any downloaded torrent file(not so much but regular)! keep going, we try harder with thumbs up. Nemez

I don't know if you all just clicked in here because you saw that there were already comments on the torrent or not, but when you have already entered a torrent page its a very small task to leave a comment.

Before I started helping Merzedes and was only a downloader myself, I would make sure to comment on as many torrents I could. And atleast those without any comments, even though I had not downloaded them personally.

Unlike some other uploaders who make profit through sponsored screens-links etc. we only want a few kind words on each upload.

Not only to see that our work is appreciated, but also to select which shoots to upload first when we have several..

Thanks for all the response here, hope we don't have to put on any more charades for a while :D hehe

But on a serious note:

When requesting reseeds or uploads, we expect  (atleast) the one requesting to leave thanks. 

If not we will stop helping him/her.. This is not a joke. Cheers.

I didn't know it was that important. From now on I'll leave a thanks on each one I download :)

Also, I'm sorry if this request is getting annoying, but I would love to see this get uploaded http://www.societysm.com/models/Natali_Demore.html (or at least the one from 03/07/2007)  ^^

Also....if you have any more older shoots and live shows...keep them coming... (the reason i have a user here is because of your uploads)

Sorry....You 2 represent the main reason I come here.....
